definition: Miyun town and county in Beijing
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Primary Study on the Response of Hydrology on Land-Use Change in Miyun Watershed.
sentences.chinese: 密雲水庫流域土地利用變化水文響應初步研究。

sentences.english: The water in Miyun is clean and not polluted.
sentences.chinese: 密雲水庫的水很乾淨沒有受污染。

sentences.english: From the end of Qing dynasty to Minguo, Miyun Manchu City was gradually ruined.
sentences.chinese: 從清末至民國時期，密雲“滿城”逐漸走向了消亡。

sentences.english: Miyun Reservoir, Asian biggest artificial lake, Yanshan pearl, summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 密雲水庫，亞洲最大的人工湖，燕山明珠，避暑勝地。

sentences.english: To Miyun, Tongzhou lavender from the garden by car How long?
sentences.chinese: 從通州自駕去密雲薰衣草園要多長時間？

sentences.english: Cloud Mongolia canyon scenic spot located at the Miyun Reservoir west side, southeast Yunmeng slope.
sentences.chinese: 雲蒙峽風景區位於密雲水庫西側，雲蒙山東南坡。

sentences.english: Are you all ready for the trip to Miyun next week?
sentences.chinese: 你下週到密雲之行準備好了嗎？

sentences.english: He loads the clouds with moisture; he scatters his lightning through them.
sentences.chinese: 他使密雲盛滿水氣，佈散電光之雲。

sentences.english: Xiao Yun is introducing Miyun county and Shicheng to Peter.
sentences.chinese: 小云正在向彼得介紹密雲和石城。

sentences.english: Thick clouds darkened the sky before the rain fell.
sentences.chinese: 降雨之前密雲遮滿了天空。

sentences.english: Good. Are you all ready for the trip to Miyun next week?
sentences.chinese: 極好。你下週到密雲之行準備好了嗎？

sentences.english: The protective layer of the Paiho earthdam at the Miyun Reservoir slid during an earthquake in 1976.
sentences.chinese: 1976年地震時密雲水庫白河土壩保護層發生滑坡。

sentences.english: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.
sentences.chinese: 將水包在密雲中，雲卻不破裂。

sentences.english: This institute has a Health Base in the MiYun County, it is a wonderful place.
sentences.chinese: 該研究院在山清水秀的密雲縣建有基地。

sentences.english: East nine bay Grand Canyon Miyun Reservoir, west Yunmeng prominent peak.
sentences.chinese: 九道灣大峽谷東起密雲水庫，西起雲蒙山主峯。

definition: Huairou rural district of Beijing, formerly Huairou county
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
Mt Luofushan in Zengcheng county, Guangdong
to undergo change in weather/restoration of reactionary rule or the previous regime
